question: Which tele-com service provider recently partnered with Google Cloud to enhance its services to Indian businessmen?
explanation:
Leading Indian tele-com service provider, Bharti Airtel and Google Cloud announced a partnership recently. Through the partnership, Airtel will be able to offer ‘G-suite’ to small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) in India.
G-Suite is a set of applications which include Gmail, Docs, Drive, Calendar and other productivity tools developed by Google. This agreement would help both the companies to tap growth opportunities in Indian market. As of now, Airtel provides tele-com service to nearly 5 lakh small and medium businesses and several thousand large businesses.
